extendedInfo.description: An electronic quick reference for the Rancho Los Amigos scale.  The Rancho Los Amigos scale was developed by the Rancho Los Amigos Hospital of California, and is used by medical professionals and families of head injury survivors to assess brain activity and rate the level of coma.

reviews.title: Just a description
reviews.comment: Opens up to list of scale levels, touch a level and it gives a pop-up with a bit more detail.  Not really a good app for frequent users of the scale, might be more fitting for users who are not familiar with the details of the scale or if you are an infrequent user of the Rancho Levels.
reviews.author: A Google User
